creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two sections; both have geometric embroidered centers in pink, blue, green, lavender with black pounded indigo borders; top has a 2" embroidered square on lower border; similar squares are on reverse lower corners of bottom; black border and lining; ties at middle bottom
title: Baby Carrier
